title: Deivangal Ellam Thotre Pogum Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
Deivangal Ellam Thotre Pogum Lyrics  With English Meaning

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Dheivangal ellam thottre pogum
thandhai anbin munney.
thaalaatu paadum annaiyin anbum
thandhai anbin pinney.

Thagapanin kanneerai kandorillai
thandhai soll mikka mandhiram illai

Ennuyir anuvil varum unuyir allava
mannil vandha naan un nagal allava
kaalangal kanda pinney
unnai kanden

Dheivangal ellam thottre pogum
thandhai anbin munney
thaalaatup paadum annaiyin anbum
thandhai anbin pinney

Kandipilum thandipilum
kodhidum un mugam.
kaichal vandhu padukail
thudipadhum un mugam.

ambaariyaai yetrikondu
andru senra oorvalam
thagapanin anaipile
kidandhadhum or sugam

Valarndhavumey yaavarum
theevaai pogirom.
Thandhai avanin paasathai
engae kaangirom.

namakenave vandha
nanban thandhai

Dheivangal ellam thottre pogum
thandhai anbin munney
thaalaatup paadum annaiyin anbum
thandhai anbin pinney		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
God’s affection will fail
before a Father’s affection.
A mother love is also next
to a father’s love.

no one has seen a father’s tear
Father’s advice means a lot.

your nucleus is in my soul
am your copy in this earth
only after your death
i realized you.

God’s affection will fail
before a Father’s affection.
A mother love is also next
to a father’s love.

while being strict n punishing
an angry father is you.
while being sick
throbbing father is you .

like a  Procession
that you took me in childhood.
lying in a Father’s hug
is a beautiful comfort.

once we grow up
we’ve separate life.
we never mind/see
a father affection.

Father is a friend
that God gave to us.

God’s affection will fail
before a Father’s affection.
A mother love is also next
to a father’s love.
